name: bulma
author: jgthms <bbxdesign@gmail.com>
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-sass && npm run autoprefix
scripts.build-sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --output css/ bulma.sass --outFile css/bulma.css
scripts.pre-push: npm run build && git add css && git commit --amend --no-edit
